00047 // specialize std::iterator_traits to avoid problems with the name of
00048 // pointer's constructor shadowing its nested pointer type
00049 // do this before pointer is defined so the specialization is correctly
00050 // used inside the definition
00051 namespace std
00052 {
00053 
00054 template<typename Element>
00055   struct iterator_traits<thrust::system::cpp::pointer<Element> >
00056 {
00057   private:
00058     typedef thrust::system::cpp::pointer<Element> ptr;
00059 
00060   public:
00061     typedef typename ptr::iterator_category       iterator_category;
00062     typedef typename ptr::value_type              value_type;
00063     typedef typename ptr::difference_type         difference_type;
00064     typedef ptr                                   pointer;
00065     typedef typename ptr::reference               reference;
00066 }; // end iterator_traits
00067 
00068 } // end std
00069

00095 // forward declaration of reference for pointer
00096 template<typename Element> class reference;
00097 
00101 // XXX nvcc + msvc have trouble instantiating reference below
00102 //     this is a workaround
00103 namespace detail
00104 {
00105 
00106 template<typename Element>
00107   struct reference_msvc_workaround
00108 {
00109   typedef thrust::system::cpp::reference<Element> type;
00110 }; // end reference_msvc_workaround
00111 
00112 } // end detail
00113 
00117 #if 0
00118 
00122 struct tag { unspecified };
00123 #endif

00146 template<typename T>
00147   class pointer
00148     : public thrust::pointer<
00149                T,
00150                thrust::system::cpp::tag,
00151                thrust::system::cpp::reference<T>,
00152                thrust::system::cpp::pointer<T>
00153              >
00154 {
00158   private:
00159     typedef thrust::pointer<
00160       T,
00161       thrust::system::cpp::tag,
00162       //thrust::system::cpp::reference<T>,
00163       typename detail::reference_msvc_workaround<T>::type,
00164       thrust::system::cpp::pointer<T>
00165     > super_t;
00166 
00170   public:
00171     // note that cpp::pointer's member functions need __host__ __device__
00172     // to interoperate with nvcc + iterators' dereference member function
00173 
00176     __host__ __device__
00177     pointer() : super_t() {}
00178 
00185     template<typename OtherT>
00186     __host__ __device__
00187     explicit pointer(OtherT *ptr) : super_t(ptr) {}
00188 
00195     template<typename OtherPointer>
00196     __host__ __device__
00197     pointer(const OtherPointer &other,
00198             typename thrust::detail::enable_if_pointer_is_convertible<
00199               OtherPointer,
00200               pointer
00201             >::type * = 0) : super_t(other) {}
00202 
00209     template<typename OtherPointer>
00210     __host__ __device__
00211     typename thrust::detail::enable_if_pointer_is_convertible<
00212       OtherPointer,
00213       pointer,
00214       pointer &
00215     >::type
00216     operator=(const OtherPointer &other)
00217     {
00218       return super_t::operator=(other);
00219     }
00220 }; // end pointer
00221 
00222 
00228 template<typename T>
00229   class reference
00230     : public thrust::reference<
00231                T,
00232                thrust::system::cpp::pointer<T>,
00233                thrust::system::cpp::reference<T>
00234              >
00235 {
00239   private:
00240     typedef thrust::reference<
00241       T,
00242       thrust::system::cpp::pointer<T>,
00243       thrust::system::cpp::reference<T>
00244     > super_t;
00245 
00249   public:
00253     typedef typename super_t::value_type value_type;
00254     typedef typename super_t::pointer    pointer;
00255 
00265     __host__ __device__
00266     explicit reference(const pointer &ptr)
00267       : super_t(ptr)
00268     {}
00269 
00279     template<typename OtherT>
00280     __host__ __device__
00281     reference(const reference<OtherT> &other,
00282               typename thrust::detail::enable_if_convertible<
00283                 typename reference<OtherT>::pointer,
00284                 pointer
00285               >::type * = 0)
00286       : super_t(other)
00287     {}
00288 
00295     template<typename OtherT>
00296     reference &operator=(const reference<OtherT> &other);
00297 
00303     reference &operator=(const value_type &x);
00304 }; // end reference

00311 __host__ __device__
00312 void swap(reference<T> x, reference<T> y);

00334 // XXX upon c++11
00335 // template<typename T> using allocator = thrust::detail::malloc_allocator<T,tag,pointer<T> >;

00341 template<typename T>
00342   struct allocator
00343     : thrust::detail::malloc_allocator<
00344         T,
00345         tag,
00346         pointer<T>
00347       >
00348 {
00354   template<typename U>
00355     struct rebind
00356   {
00359     typedef allocator<U> other;
00360   };
00361 
00364   __host__ __device__
00365   inline allocator() {}
00366 
00369   __host__ __device__
00370   inline allocator(const allocator &) {}
00371 
00374   template<typename U>
00375   __host__ __device__
00376   inline allocator(const allocator<U> &) {}
00377 
00380   __host__ __device__
00381   inline ~allocator() {}
00382 }; // end allocator
